name: Infatuation Simulation
description:
♡ join a girl by the name of esme along in a journey fueled by love, blood, and misery.

♡ there are 5 achievable endings total, one being more hidden! 

♡ gameplay is around 30 minutes - 1 hour depending on reading speed! 

♡ ko-fi (donations are not needed, but i am extremely grateful for any amount!)

♡ trigger warnings include: blood, minor gore, knives, stalking, obsession, & sexual references. viewer discretion is advised! 

♡ please let me know if you run into any bugs or typos! i am always looking to improve the game and add more fanart to the gallery as well, please tag me on twitter!
